--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She was mumbling in her sleep. "Mama, no, Mama, I no wanna go. I 
> wanna stay. No Mama, I wanna stay, I wanna sts..."
